translated: The twenty-second chapter of the Tantra of the DƒÅkinƒ´‚Äôs Flame of Wisdom is complete.

original: mchod na rgyal ba rigs lnga rtag tu mchod //
analyzed: mchod na rgyal ba rigs lnga rtag tu mchod //
translated: If you make offerings, always make offerings to the five buddha families.

original: srung na dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad srungs //
analyzed: srung na dam tshig nyi shu rtsa brgyad srungs //
translated: If you guard, guard the twenty-eight commitments.

original: dgra byung lha mo @372b nag mo mtshon char phyung //
analyzed: dgra byung lha mo @372b nag mo mtshon char phyung //
translated: If an enemy appears, send out the weapon of the goddess KurukullƒÅ.

original: nyes chung kha 'thab tsam la mtshon mi dbyung //üîΩnga yi dkor khang 'jig na mtshon char phyung //
analyzed: nyes chung kha 'thab tsam la mtshon mi dbyung // nga yi dkor khang 'jig na mtshon char phyung //
translated: Do not send out weapons for minor offenses, such as mere verbal disputes.üîΩIf my temple is destroyed, send out weapons.

original: dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod na mtshon char phyung //
analyzed: dkon mchog dbu 'phang smod na mtshon char phyung //
translated: If the status of the Three Jewels is diminished, send out weapons.

original: sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig na mtshon char phyung //
analyzed: sangs rgyas bstan pa 'jig na mtshon char phyung //
translated: If the teachings of the Buddha are destroyed, send out weapons.

original: dkon mchog sku dgra dar na mtshon char phyung //
analyzed: dkon mchog sku dgra dar na mtshon char phyung //
translated: If the enemies of the Three Jewels prosper, send out weapons.

original: zhes slob dpon padmas slob bu glang dpal gyi seng ge la de skad ces bka' stsal zhing gdams so ////
analyzed: zhes slob dpon padmas slob bu glang dpal gyi seng ge la de skad ces bka' stsal zhing gdams so ////
translated: Thus the master Padmasambhava gave this advice to his disciple Lang Palgyi Senge.
